boons.name: Heartbreak Flourish
boons.description: Your Special deals more damage and inflicts Weak.

boons.description: Your Cast is a wide, short-range blast that inflicts Weak.

boons.name: Passion Dash
boons.description: Your Dash inflicts damage where you end up, inflicting Weak.

boons.name: Aphrodite's Aid
boons.description: Your Call fires a seeking projectile that inflicts Charm.

boons.name: Dying Lament
boons.description: When foes are slain, they damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

boons.name: Wave of Despair
boons.description: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

boons.name: Different League
boons.description: Resist some damage from nearby foes' attacks.

boons.name: Life Affirmation
boons.description: Any Health or Health chamber rewards are worth more.

boons.name: Empty Inside
boons.description: Your Weak effects have a longer duration.

boons.name: Sweet Surrender
boons.description: Weak-afflicted foes are also more susceptible to damage.

boons.name: Broken Resolve
boons.description: Your Weak effects are more potent.

boons.name: Exit Wounds
boons.description: Your foes take damage when your Cast stuck in them is dislodged.

boons.name: Proud Bearing
boons.description: You begin each Encounter with your God Gauge partly full.

boons.name: Boiling Point
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you take damage.

boons.name: Clouded Judgment
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you deal or take damage.

boons.name: Billowing Strength

boons.name: Curse of Longing
boons.description: Your Doom effects continuously strike Weak foes.

boons.name: Heart Rend
boons.description: Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Weak foes.

boons.name: Parting Shot
